product_name: Smith Trailblazer ChromaPop Polarchromic Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: The rimless Smith Trailblazer ChromaPop Polarchromic Sunglasses give you unobstructed views of the surf, sand and sea. Advanced lenses offer auto-adjust tint, clarity, contrast and vivid colors.
short_description: The rimless Smith Trailblazer ChromaPop Polarchromic Sunglasses give you unobstructed views of the surf, sand and sea. Advanced lenses offer auto-adjust tint, clarity, contrast and vivid colors.
